thread.title: Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World'
thread.title_full: Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World'

title: Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World'
text:
Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World' Voice actors sound little changed from 1992 POSTED: 11:59 AM MDT Oct 12, 2015 UPDATED: 11:18 AM MDT Oct 12, 2015 Large Text Justin Kahn/Getty Images 
The original cast members who sang "A Whole New World" during the magic carpet ride sequence in "Aladdin" reunited to perform the song nearly a quarter century later. 
Lea Salonga (Jasmine) and Brad Kane (Aladdin) sang the heart-melting tune, accompanied by songwriter Alan Menken on piano. Related Content
